_header: Jesu that died upon the rood
Title(s): Life of St. Thomas of Canterbury
Subjects: Thomas of Canterbury, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Thomas of Canterbury — in quatrains

BodRawPoe225.First Lines:
He þat died on þe rode & sithin res up fro deth to
                    lyf…
BodRawPoe225.Last Lines:
…Graunte vs alle þi blysse aboven & brynge vs to
                    þin kyng dome
BodRawPoe225.Attributed Title:
Assit principio sancta maria meo Hic incipit uita sancti Thome martyris
                        archiepiscopi Cantuariensis (f. 53)
BodRawPoe225.Editions:
Brown,  Paul Alonzo. 
             The Development of the Legend of Thomas Becket.
         Philadelphia: University of Pennsylvania, 1930: 262-8.
